p: Ten grams of frozen Blomia tropicalis extract (Siriraj Dust Mite Centre for Services and Research, Thailand) was extracted overnight with slow stirring at 4°C in PBS (pH 7.4). The extract was then centrifuged at 13,000xg for 30 min at 4°C, and the supernatant was filtered through a 0.22-μm filter and stored at −80°C. The extract was assayed for endotoxin levels using the QCL-1000 kit (Hyglos GmbH, Bavaria, Germany) according to manufactures instructions and was less than 20 EU/mg of protein.
